title: Cafe Bain-Marie
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, French
description: French styled lacto-ovo vegetarian cafe restaurant with also options for vegans by advance request (including vegan sweets). Uses organic produce. Organic wine available. Applies a cover charge if you don't reserve ahead. Also, reservation is required for party of 5 or more (course meals offered in such case). Lunch price moderate, dinner more. Kitchen breaks from early afternoon til 6pm.
